name: 4x4 Monster Truck NY City Driv
description:
During the stunt racing, you have to avoid from sharp turns and impossible falls in this4x4 Monster Truck NY City Driving. If you fall from the mega ramp that is on sky high your level will be failed in this Monster truck racing legends demolition
You might play multiple truck game but you never played such a speed monster.

Features:
-Multiple impossible tracks
-High definition graphics
-Mid-air impossible tracks
-Stunning sounds and background music
-Multiple monster trucks and truck stunts
